awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: "Farewell, My Concubine" is a movie with two parallel, intertwined stories. It is the story of two performers in the Beijing Opera, stage brothers, and the woman who comes between them. At the same time, it attempts to do no less than squeeze the entire political history of China in the twentieth century into a three-hour time-frame.
plot: The story of two men, who met as apprentices in the Peking Opera, and stayed friends for over 50 years.
title: Farewell My Concubine

tomatoes.consensus: Chen Kaing's epic is grand in scope and presentation, and, bolstered by solid performances, the result is a film both horrifying and enthralling.
